bug.author: loomlike
bug.summary: [BUG] Wide and Deep notebook is throwing an error when ITEM_FEAT_COL=None
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
Wide and Deep notebook is throwing an error when ITEM_FEAT_COL=None <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the issue?</denchmark-h>
set ITEM_FEAT_COL=None and run the notebook <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
The model should run w/ and w/o item features <denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>
The bug fix will include some other improvements in coding style:
Use tempfile instead of shutil.rmtree to clean things up Allow EPOCHS=0 (do 1 batch) for quick testing of the notebook
